item.description:
Give your children (and yourselves) exposure to a language spoken only by a billion of your fellow humans. We mostly play, and try to get in a story or song or two. All levels of Mandarin Chinese ability welcome!

The main branch of the Cambridge Public Library has a wonderful children's area on the top floor. They do have Baby Lapsit 10-10:30am and an all-ages Singalong 11-11:30am on Mondays. We can decide to participate or talk about where to relocate if it's too disruptive.

There is ample underground parking ($0.25/15 min by cash or MC/Visa). It's also a quick walk from the Harvard station, and there are a number of bus routes that go by the library.

If your schedule changes and this is no longer a good time for you to meet, please update your responses on the Doodle poll.
item.name: Weekly Mandarin playdate
